Key Match Events: Jamaica scored an own goal in the 13th minute
Ecuador scored a penalty just before halftime
Ecuador scored a counter-attack goal in the 91st minute
Jamaica scored their first Copa America goal
Jamaica thought they had a penalty but it was not awarded
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador's victory moved them level on points with Mexico and Venezuela
Jamaica's elimination hopes depend on their final match
The top two teams in Group B will progress to the quarterfinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jamaica scored their first Copa America goal in their eighth match
